skills.title: Front-End

skills.title: Back-End

skills.title: Website Development

portfolio.title: Digital Art
portfolio.description: Create art using digital technology, like computers and software. Use tools such as Photoshop and Illustrator to design digitally.

portfolio.title: Drawing
portfolio.description: Create art with physical tools like pencils, pens, and paper. It's hands-on, allowing artists to sketch, shade, and add detail manually.

portfolio.title: Senior Photos
portfolio.description: Senior photos focuses on capturing images of college seniors to commemorate their last year. These photos displays the senior's personality.
